summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 MONTANA FIFTH WHEEL.   SHE STATED THAT THE REFRIGERATOR LOSS POWER ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS WHILE THE VEHICLE HAS WAS STATIONARY. THE RECALLED PART HAS BEEN REPLACED HOWEVER THE FAILURE CONTINUED TO OCCUR.  THERE IS A RECALL FOR THE DOMETIC REFRIGERATOR (NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID 08E032000 AND 06E076000).  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 4,000 AND CURRENT MILEAGE IS 9,000.
